001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004
005import javax.activation.DataHandler;
006import javax.activation.DataSource;
007import javax.activation.FileDataSource;
008import javax.mail.MessagingException;
009import javax.mail.Multipart;
010import javax.mail.Transport;
011import javax.mail.internet.*;
012import java.io.*;
013import java.time.LocalDateTime;
014import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
015import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
016import java.time.format.FormatStyle;
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.jar.Attributes;
019import java.util.regex.Matcher;
020import java.util.regex.Pattern;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024/**
025 * This class is used to submit assignments in CS410J.  The user
026 * specified his or her email address as well as the base directory
027 * for his/her source files on the command line.  The directory is
028 * searched recursively for files that are allowed to be submitted.
029 * Those files are
030 * placed in a zip file and emailed to the grader.  A confirmation
031 * email is sent to the submitter.
032 *
033 * More information about the JavaMail API can be found at:
034 *
035 * <a href="http://java.sun.com/products/javamail">
036 * http://java.sun.com/products/javamail</a>
037 *
038 * @author David Whitlock
039 * @since Fall 2000 (Refactored to use fewer static methods in Spring 2006)
040 */
041public class Submit extends EmailSender {
042
043  private static final PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(System.out, true);
044  private static final PrintWriter err = new PrintWriter(System.err, true);
045
046  /////////////////////  Instance Fields  //////////////////////////
047
048  /**
049   * The name of the project being submitted
050   */
051  private String projName = null;
052
053  /**
054   * The name of the user (student) submits the project
055   */
056  private String userName = null;
057
058  /**
059   * The submitter's email address
060   */
061  private String userEmail = null;
062
063  /**
064   * The submitter's user id
065   */
066  private String userId = null;
067
068  /**
069   * A comment describing the project
070   */
071  private String comment = null;
072
073  /**
074   * Should the execution of this program be logged?
075   */
076  private boolean debug = false;
077
078  /**
079   * Should the generated zip file be saved?
080   */
081  private boolean saveZip = false;
082
083  private boolean sendEmails = true;
084
085  /**
086   * The time at which the project was submitted
087   */
088  private LocalDateTime submitTime = null;
089
090  /**
091   * The names of the files to be submitted
092   */
093  private Set<String> fileNames = new HashSet<>();
094
095  private boolean isSubmittingKoans = false;
096  private boolean sendReceipt = true;
097  private boolean failIfDisallowedFiles = true;
098
099  ///////////////////////  Constructors  /////////////////////////

101  /**
102   * Creates a new <code>Submit</code> program
103   */
104  Submit() {
105
106  }

111   * Sets the name of the SMTP server that is used to send emails
112   */
113  void setEmailServerHostName(String serverName) {
114    EmailSender.serverName = serverName;
115  }

117  /**
118   * Sets whether or not the progress of the submission should be logged.
119   */
120  public void setDebug(boolean debug) {
121    this.debug = debug;
122  }

124  /**
125   * Sets whether or not the zip file generated by the submission
126   * should be saved.
127   */
128  private void setSaveZip(boolean saveZip) {
129    this.saveZip = saveZip;
130  }
131
132  private void setSendEmails(boolean sendEmails) {
133    this.sendEmails = sendEmails;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Sets the comment for this submission

140    this.comment = comment;
141  }

143  /**
144   * Sets the name of project being submitted
145   */
146  void setProjectName(String projName) {
147    this.projName = projName;
148  }
149
150  /**
151   * Sets the name of the user who is submitting the project
152   */
153  void setUserName(String userName) {
154    this.userName = userName;
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Sets the id of the user who is submitting the project
159   */
160  void setUserId(String userId) {
161    this.userId = userId;
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Sets the email address of the user who is submitting the project
166   */
167  void setUserEmail(String userEmail) {
168    this.userEmail = userEmail;
169  }

171  void setFailIfDisallowedFiles(boolean failIfDisallowedFiles) {
172    this.failIfDisallowedFiles = failIfDisallowedFiles;
173  }
174
175  /**
176   * Adds the file with the given name to the list of files to be
177   * submitted.
178   */
179  void addFile(String fileName) {
180    this.fileNames.add(fileName);
181  }
182
183  /**
184   * Validates the state of this submission
185   *
186   * @throws IllegalStateException If any state is incorrect or missing
187   */
188  private void validate() {
189    validateProjectName();
190
191    if (projName == null) {
192      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing project name");
193    }
194
195    if (userName == null) {
196      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing student name");
197    }
198
199    if (userId == null) {
200      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing login id");
201    }
202
203    if (isNineDigitStudentId(userId)) {
204      throw new IllegalStateException(loginIdShouldNotBeStudentId(userId));
205    }
206
207    if (looksLikeAnEmailAddress(userId)) {
208      throw new IllegalStateException(loginIdShouldNotBeEmailAddress(userId));
209    }
210
211    if (userEmail == null) {
212      throw new IllegalStateException("Missing email address");
213
214    } else {
215      // Make sure user's email is okay
216      try {
217        new InternetAddress(userEmail);
218
219      } catch (AddressException ex) {
220        String m = "Invalid email address: " + userEmail;
221        throw new IllegalStateException(m, ex);
222      }
223    }
224  }
225
226  private String loginIdShouldNotBeEmailAddress(String userId) {
227    return "Your login id (" + userId + ") should not be an email address";
228  }
229
230  @VisibleForTesting
231  boolean looksLikeAnEmailAddress(String userId) {
232    return userId.contains("@");
233  }
234
235  @VisibleForTesting
236  boolean isNineDigitStudentId(String userId) {
237    return userId.matches("^[0-9]{9}$");
238  }
239
240  private String loginIdShouldNotBeStudentId(String userId) {
241    return "Your login id (" + userId + ") should not be your 9-digit student id";
242  }
243
244  @VisibleForTesting
245  void validateProjectName() {
246    List<String> validProjectNames = fetchListOfValidProjectNames();
247    if (!validProjectNames.contains(projName)) {
248      String message = "\"" + projName + "\" is not in the list of valid project names: " + validProjectNames;
249      throw new IllegalStateException(message);
250    }
251  }
252
253  private List<String> fetchListOfValidProjectNames() {
254    return fetchListOfStringsFromResource("project-names");
255  }
256
257  private List<String> fetchListOfStringsFromResource(String resourceName) {
258    InputStream stream = this.getClass().getResourceAsStream(resourceName);
259    List<String> strings = new ArrayList<>();
260    try {
261
262      InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(stream);
263      BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(isr);
264      while (br.ready()) {
265        strings.add(br.readLine().trim());
266      }
267
268    } catch (IOException ex) {
269      err.println("** WARNING: Problems while reading " + resourceName + ": " + ex.getMessage());
270    }
271
272    return strings;
273  }
274
275  /**
276   * Submits the project to the grader
277   *
278   * @param verify Should the user be prompted to verify his submission?
279   * @return Whether or not the submission actually occurred
280   * @throws IllegalStateException If no source files were found
281   */
282  public boolean submit(boolean verify) throws IOException, MessagingException {
283    // Recursively search the source directory for .java files
284    Set<File> sourceFiles = searchForSourceFiles(fileNames);
285
286    db(sourceFiles.size() + " source files found");
287
288    if (sourceFiles.size() == 0) {
289      String s = "No source files were found.";
290      throw new IllegalStateException(s);
291    } else if (sourceFiles.size() < 3) {
292      String s = "Too few source files were submitted. Each project requires at least 3 files be" + 
293                 " submitted. You only submitted " + sourceFiles.size() + " files";
294      throw new IllegalStateException(s);
295    }
296
297    // Verify submission with user
298    if (verify && !verifySubmission(sourceFiles)) {
299      // User does not want to submit
300      return false;
301    }
302
303    // Timestamp
304    this.submitTime = LocalDateTime.now();
305
306    // Create a temporary zip file to hold the source files
307    File zipFile = makeZipFileWith(sourceFiles);
308
309    if (this.sendEmails) {
310      // Send the zip file as an email attachment to the TA
311      mailTA(zipFile, sourceFiles);
312
313      if (sendReceipt) {
314        mailReceipt(sourceFiles);
315      }
316    }
317
318    return true;
319  }
320
321  /**
322   * Prints debugging output.
323   */
324  private void db(String s) {
325    if (this.debug) {
326      err.println("++ " + s);
327    }
328  }
329
330  /**
331   * Searches for the files given on the command line.  Ignores files
332   * that do not end in .java, or that appear on the "no submit" list.
333   * Files must reside in a directory named
334   * edu/pdx/cs410J/<studentId>.
335   */
336  private Set<File> searchForSourceFiles(Set<String> fileNames) {
337    // Files should be sorted by name
338    SortedSet<File> files =
339      new TreeSet<>(Comparator.comparing(File::toString));
340    populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(files, fileNames);
341
342    files.removeIf((file) -> !canBeSubmitted(file));
343
344    return files;
345  }
346
347  private void populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(SortedSet<File> allFiles, Set<String> fileNames) {
348    populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(allFiles, fileNames.stream().map(name -> new File(name).getAbsoluteFile()));
349  }
350
351  private void populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(SortedSet<File> allFiles, Stream<File> files) {
352    files.forEach((file) -> {
353      if (file.isDirectory()) {
354        populateWithFilesFromSubdirectories(allFiles, Arrays.stream(file.listFiles()));
355
356      } else {
357        allFiles.add(file);
358      }
359    });
360
361  }
362
363  protected boolean canBeSubmitted(File file) {
364    if (!fileExists(file)) {
365      return false;
366    }
367
368    // Is the file on the "no submit" list?
369    List<String> noSubmit = fetchListOfFilesThatCanNotBeSubmitted();
370    String name = file.getName();
371    if (noSubmit.contains(name)) {
372      err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
373        " because it is on the \"no submit\" list");
374      return false;
375    }
376
377    // Verify that file is in the correct directory.
378    if (isInAKoansDirectory(file)) {
379      if (!file.getName().endsWith(".java")) {
380        err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
381          " because does end in \".java\"");
382        return false;
383      }
384
385    } else {
386      if (!isInMavenProjectDirectory(file)) {
387        err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
388          ": it does not reside in a Maven project in a directory named " +
389          "edu" + File.separator + "pdx" + File.separator +
390          "cs410J" + File.separator + userId + " (or in one of the koans directories)");
391        return false;
392      }
393
394      // Does the file name end in .java?
395      if (!canFileBeSubmitted(file)) {
396        String fileName = file.getName();
397        int index = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
398        if (index < 0) {
399          err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
400            " because it does not have an extension.");
401
402        } else {
403          String fileExtension = fileName.substring(index);
404          err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
405            " because files ending in " + fileExtension +
406            " are not supposed to be in that directory");
407        }
408        return false;
409      }
410    }
411    return true;
412  }
413
414  @VisibleForTesting
415  static boolean canFileBeSubmitted(File file) {
416    String path = file.getPath();
417
418    if (path.matches(".*src/.*/java/.*")) {
419      return path.endsWith(".java");
420
421    } else if (path.matches(".*src/.*/javadoc/.*")) {
422      return path.endsWith(".html");
423
424    } else if (path.matches(".*src/.*/resources/.*")) {
425      return path.endsWith(".xml") || path.endsWith(".txt");
426
427    } else {
428      return false;
429    }
430  }
431
432  boolean fileExists(File file) {
433    if (!file.exists()) {
434      err.println("** Not submitting file " + file +
435        " because it does not exist");
436      return false;
437    }
438    return true;
439  }
440
441  private boolean isInAKoansDirectory(File file) {
442    boolean isInAKoansDirectory = hasParentDirectories(file, "beginner") ||
443      hasParentDirectories(file, "intermediate") ||
444      hasParentDirectories(file, "advanced") ||
445      hasParentDirectories(file, "java7") ||
446      hasParentDirectories(file, "java8");
447    if (isInAKoansDirectory) {
448      this.isSubmittingKoans = true;
449      db(file + " is in a koans directory");
450    }
451    return isInAKoansDirectory;
452  }
453
454  @VisibleForTesting
455  boolean isInMavenProjectDirectory(File file) {
456    boolean isInMavenProjectDirectory = hasParentDirectories(file, userId, "cs410J", "pdx", "edu", "java|javadoc|resources", "main|test|it", "src");
457    if (isInMavenProjectDirectory) {
458      db(file + " is in the edu/pdx/cs410J directory");
459    }
460    return isInMavenProjectDirectory;
461  }
462
463  private boolean hasParentDirectories(File file, String... parentDirectoryNames) {
464    File parent = file.getParentFile();
465
466    // Skip over subpackages
467    while (parent != null && !parent.getName().equals(parentDirectoryNames[0])) {
468      parent = parent.getParentFile();
469    }
470
471    for (String parentDirectoryName : parentDirectoryNames) {
472      if (parent == null || !parent.getName().matches(parentDirectoryName)) {
473        return false;
474
475      } else {
476        parent = parent.getParentFile();
477      }
478    }
479
480    return true;
481  }
482
483  private List<String> fetchListOfFilesThatCanNotBeSubmitted() {
484    return fetchListOfStringsFromResource("no-submit");
485  }
486
487  /**
488   * Prints a summary of what is about to be submitted and prompts the
489   * user to verify that it is correct.
490   *
491   * @return <code>true</code> if the user wants to submit
492   */
493  private boolean verifySubmission(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
494    // Print out what is going to be submitted
495    out.print("\n" + userName);
496    out.print("'s submission for ");
497    out.println(projName);
498
499    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
500      out.println("  " + file);
501    }
502
503    if (comment != null) {
504      out.println("\nComment: " + comment + "\n\n");
505    }
506
507    out.println("A receipt will be sent to: " + userEmail + "\n");
508
509    warnIfMainProjectClassIsNotSubmitted(sourceFiles);
510
511    warnIfTestClassesAreNotSubmitted(sourceFiles);
512
513    return doesUserWantToSubmit();
514  }
515
516  protected void warnIfMainProjectClassIsNotSubmitted(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
517    boolean wasMainProjectClassSubmitted = sourceFiles.stream().anyMatch((f) -> f.getName().contains(this.projName));
518    if (!wasMainProjectClassSubmitted && !this.isSubmittingKoans) {
519      String mainProjectClassName = this.projName + ".java";
520      out.println("*** WARNING: You are submitting " + this.projName +
521        ", but did not include " + mainProjectClassName + ".\n" +
522        "    You might want to check the name of the project or the files you are submitting.\n");
523    }
524  }
525
526  private void warnIfTestClassesAreNotSubmitted(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
527    boolean wereTestClassessSubmitted = submittedTestClasses(sourceFiles);
528    if (!wereTestClassessSubmitted && !this.isSubmittingKoans) {
529      out.println("*** WARNING: You are not submitting a \"test\" directory.\n" +
530        "    Your unit tests are executed as part of the grading of your project.\n");
531    }
532  }
533
534  @VisibleForTesting
535  static boolean submittedTestClasses(Set<File> sourceFiles) {
536    return sourceFiles.stream().anyMatch((f) -> f.getPath().contains("test"));
537  }
538
539  private boolean doesUserWantToSubmit() {
540    InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(System.in);
541    BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(isr);
542
543    while (true) {
544      out.print("Do you wish to continue with the submission? (yes/no) ");
545      out.flush();
546
547      try {
548        String line = in.readLine().trim();
549        switch (line) {
550          case "yes":
551            return true;
552
553          case "no":
554            return false;
555
556          default:
557            err.println("** Please enter yes or no");
558            break;
559        }
560
561      } catch (IOException ex) {
562        err.println("** Exception while reading from System.in: " + ex);
563      }
564    }
565  }
566
567  /**
568   * Returns the name of a <code>File</code> relative to the source
569   * directory.
570   */
571  protected String getZipEntryNameFor(File file) {
572    if (isSubmittingKoans) {
573      return file.getParentFile().getName() + "/" + file.getName();
574
575    } else {
576      // We already know that the file is in the correct directory
577      return getZipEntryNameFor(file.getPath());
578    }
579  }
580
581  @VisibleForTesting
582  static String getZipEntryNameFor(String filePath) {
583    Pattern pattern = Pattern.compile(".*/src/(main|test|it)/(java|javadoc|resources)/edu/pdx/cs410J/(.*)");
584    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(filePath);
585
586    if (matcher.matches()) {
587      return "src/" + matcher.group(1) + "/" + matcher.group(2) + "/edu/pdx/cs410J/" + matcher.group(3);
588    } else {
589      throw new IllegalStateException("Can't extract zip entry name for " + filePath);
590    }
591  }
592
593  /**
594   * Creates a Zip file that contains the source files.  The Zip File
595   * is temporary and is deleted when the program exits.
596   */
597  private File makeZipFileWith(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws IOException {
598    String zipFileName = userName.replace(' ', '_') + "-TEMP";
599    File zipFile = File.createTempFile(zipFileName, ".zip");
600    if (!saveZip) {
601      zipFile.deleteOnExit();
602
603    } else {
604      out.println("Saving temporary Zip file: " + zipFile);
605    }
606
607    db("Created Zip file: " + zipFile);
608
609    Map<File, String> sourceFilesWithNames =
610      sourceFiles.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(file -> file, this::getZipEntryNameFor));
611
612    new ZipFileOfFilesMaker(sourceFilesWithNames, zipFile, getManifestEntries()).makeZipFile();
613    return zipFile;
614  }
615
616  private Map<Attributes.Name, String> getManifestEntries() {
617    Map<Attributes.Name, String> manifestEntries = new HashMap<>();
618    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_NAME, userName);
619    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_ID, userId);
620    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.USER_EMAIL, userEmail);
621    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.PROJECT_NAME, projName);
622    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.SUBMISSION_COMMENT, comment);
623    manifestEntries.put(ManifestAttributes.SUBMISSION_TIME, ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(submitTime));
624    return manifestEntries;
625  }
626
627  /**
628   * Sends the Zip file to the TA as a MIME attachment.  Also includes
629   * a textual summary of the contents of the Zip file.
630   */
631  private void mailTA(File zipFile, Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
632    MimeMessage message =
633      newEmailTo(newEmailSession(debug), TA_EMAIL)
634        .from(userEmail, userName)
635        .withSubject("CS410J-SUBMIT " + userName + "'s " + projName)
636        .createMessage();
637
638    MimeBodyPart textPart = createTextPartOfTAEmail(sourceFiles);
639    MimeBodyPart filePart = createZipAttachment(zipFile);
640
641    Multipart mp = new MimeMultipart();
642    mp.addBodyPart(textPart);
643    mp.addBodyPart(filePart);
644
645    message.setContent(mp);
646
647    out.println("Submitting project to Grader");
648
649    Transport.send(message);
650  }
651
652  private MimeBodyPart createZipAttachment(File zipFile) throws MessagingException {
653    // Now attach the Zip file
654    DataSource ds = new FileDataSource(zipFile) {
655      @Override
656      public String getContentType() {
657        return "application/zip";
658      }
659    };
660    DataHandler dh = new DataHandler(ds);
661    MimeBodyPart filePart = new MimeBodyPart();
662
663    String zipFileTitle = userName.replace(' ', '_') + ".zip";
664
665    filePart.setDataHandler(dh);
666    filePart.setFileName(zipFileTitle);
667    filePart.setDescription(userName + "'s " + projName);
668
669    return filePart;
670  }
671
672  private MimeBodyPart createTextPartOfTAEmail(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
673    // Create the text portion of the message
674    StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
675    text.append("Student name: ").append(userName).append(" (").append(userEmail).append(")\n");
676    text.append("Project name: ").append(projName).append("\n");
677    text.append("Submitted on: ").append(humanReadableSubmitDate()).append("\n");
678    if (comment != null) {
679      text.append("\nComment: ").append(comment).append("\n\n");
680    }
681    text.append("Contents:\n");
682
683    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
684      text.append("  ").append(getZipEntryNameFor(file)).append("\n");
685    }
686    text.append("\n\n");
687
688    MimeBodyPart textPart = new MimeBodyPart();
689    textPart.setContent(text.toString(), "text/plain");
690
691    // Try not to display text as separate attachment
692    textPart.setDisposition("inline");
693    return textPart;
694  }
695
696  private String humanReadableSubmitDate() {
697    return submitTime.format(DateTimeFormatter.ofLocalizedDateTime(FormatStyle.FULL, FormatStyle.MEDIUM));
698  }
699
700  /**
701   * Sends a email to the user as a receipt of the submission.
702   */
703  private void mailReceipt(Set<File> sourceFiles) throws MessagingException {
704    String subject = "CS410J " + projName + " submission";
705    InternetAddress email = newInternetAddress(this.userEmail, this.userName);
706    MimeMessage message =
707      newEmailTo(newEmailSession(debug), email)
708        .from(TA_EMAIL)
709        .replyTo(DAVE_EMAIL)
710        .withSubject(subject)
711        .createMessage();
712
713    // Create the contents of the message
714    StringBuilder text = new StringBuilder();
715    text.append("On ").append(humanReadableSubmitDate()).append("\n");
716    text.append(userName).append(" (").append(userEmail).append(")\n");
717    text.append("submitted the following files for ").append(projName).append(":\n");
718
719    for (File file : sourceFiles) {
720      text.append("  ").append(file.getAbsolutePath()).append("\n");
721    }
722
723    if (comment != null) {
724      text.append("\nComment: ").append(comment).append("\n\n");
725    }
726
727    text.append("\n\n");
728    text.append("Have a nice day.");
729
730    // Add the text to the message and send it
731    message.setText(text.toString());
732    message.setDisposition("inline");
733
734    out.println("Sending receipt to you at " + userEmail);
735
736    Transport.send(message);
737  }
738
739  /////////////////////////  Main Program  ///////////////////////////
740
741  /**
742   * Prints usage information about this program.
743   */
744  protected void usage(String message) {
745    err.println("\n** " + message + "\n");
746    err.println("usage: java " + this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " [options] args file+");
747    err.println("  args are (in this order):");
748    if (this.projName == null) {
749      err.println("    project      What project is being submitted (Project1, Project2, etc.)");
750    }
751    err.println("    student      Who is submitting the project?");
752    err.println("    loginId      UNIX login id");
753    err.println("    email        Student's email address");
754    err.println("    srcDirectory Directory containing source code to submit");
755    err.println("  options are (options may appear in any order):");
756    err.println("    -savezip           Saves temporary Zip file");
757    err.println("    -nosend            Generates zip file, but does not send emails");
758    err.println("    -smtp serverName   Name of SMTP server");
759    err.println("    -verbose           Log debugging output");
760    err.println("    -comment comment   Info for the Grader");
761    err.println("");
762    err.println("Submits Java source code to the CS410J grader.");
763    System.exit(1);
764  }
765
766  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, MessagingException {
767    Submit submit = new Submit();
768    submit.parseCommandLineAndSubmit(args);
769  }
770
771  /**
772   * Parses the command line, finds the source files, prompts the user
773   * to verify whether or not the settings are correct, and then sends
774   * an email to the Grader.
775   */
776  void parseCommandLineAndSubmit(String[] args) throws IOException, MessagingException {
777    // Parse the command line
778    for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
779      // Check for options first
780      if (args[i].equals("-smtp")) {
781        if (++i >= args.length) {
782          usage("No SMTP server specified");
783        }
784
785        this.setEmailServerHostName(args[i]);
786
787      } else if (args[i].equals("-verbose")) {
788        this.setDebug(true);
789
790      } else if (args[i].equals("-savezip")) {
791        this.setSaveZip(true);
792
793      } else if (args[i].equals("-nosend")) {
794        this.setSendEmails(false);
795
796      } else if (args[i].equals("-comment")) {
797        if (++i >= args.length) {
798          usage("No comment specified");
799        }
800
801        this.setComment(args[i]);
802
803      } else if (this.projName == null) {
804        this.setProjectName(args[i]);
805
806      } else if (this.userName == null) {
807        this.setUserName(args[i]);
808
809      } else if (this.userId == null) {
810        this.setUserId(args[i]);
811
812      } else if (this.userEmail == null) {
813        this.setUserEmail(args[i]);
814
815      } else {
816        // The name of a source file
817        this.addFile(args[i]);
818      }
819    }
820
821    boolean submitted;
822
823    try {
824      // Make sure that user entered enough information
825      this.validate();
826
827      this.db("Command line successfully parsed.");
828
829      submitted = this.submit(true);
830
831    } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
832      usage(ex.getMessage());
833      return;
834    }
835
836    // All done.
837    if (submitted) {
838      out.println(this.projName + " submitted successfully.  Thank you.");
839
840    } else {
841      out.println(this.projName + " not submitted.");
842    }
843  }
844
845  void setSendReceipt(boolean sendReceipt) {
846    this.sendReceipt = sendReceipt;
847
848  }
849
850  static class ManifestAttributes {
851
852    static final Attributes.Name USER_NAME = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-User-Name");
853    static final Attributes.Name USER_ID = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-User-Id");
854    static final Attributes.Name USER_EMAIL = new Attributes.Name("Submitter-Email");
855    static final Attributes.Name PROJECT_NAME = new Attributes.Name("Project-Name");
856    static final Attributes.Name SUBMISSION_TIME = new Attributes.Name("Submission-Time");
857    static final Attributes.Name SUBMISSION_COMMENT = new Attributes.Name("Submission-Comment");
858
859    private static final DateTimeFormatter LEGACY_DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm:ss");
860    private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME;
861
862    static String formatSubmissionTime(LocalDateTime submitTime) {
863      return submitTime.format(DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
864    }
865
866    @VisibleForTesting
867    static String formatSubmissionTimeUsingLegacyFormat(LocalDateTime submitTime) {
868      return submitTime.format(LEGACY_DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
869    }
870
871    static LocalDateTime parseSubmissionTime(String string) {
872      try {
873        return LocalDateTime.parse(string, DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
874
875      } catch (DateTimeParseException ex) {
876        return LocalDateTime.parse(string, LEGACY_DATE_TIME_FORMATTER);
877      }
878    }
879  }
880
881}
